long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your web projects with Abstract AI. This amazing extension generates millions of random color combinations, creating breathtaking copyright-free abstract backgrounds. Save your masterpieces in PNG, JPG, or SVG format and edit them with your favorite image editing software for incredibly stunning results. With Abstract AI, the ordinary becomes extraordinary.
